column4: i plugged a 100GB Mass Storage on Ubuntu 8.04, but i cant see it?
anyone pls tell me how to acces the 100GB i just pluggen in the usb?
mount it.. access it..  check dmesg to see where its at...
check places -> computer ->  to see if its there
if its ntfs filesystem. you may need to install/run the ntfs-config tool to fully access it.
